## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3486e95cd25ff7754e4027cbfa4d4e8fff553cc460471594141914a5d697fb8a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'newrelics-scheduler' @ 1.7.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
